price: Isaan ibidda keessa jiran waardiyyoota jahannamiin nijedhan “Gooftaa keessan nuuf kadhaa (hanguma) guyyaa tokko (kan addunyaa) adabbii akka nurraa salphisu”.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna fī al-nāri likhazanati jahannama id'ʿū rabbakum yukhaffif ʿannā yawman mina al-ʿadhābi
